description: His Excellency Shri Tharman Shanmugaratnam, Deputy Prime Minister of Singapore My Fellow Ministers, Chief Ministers, Invited speakers and friends, There was a time when development was believed
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
Attended inaugural Transforming India Lecture. This is an attempt to bring in ideas which can usher a positive transformation in India. Mr. Tharman Shanmugaratnam enriched us with his views & insights. A prolific scholar, it was most apt he addressed the inaugural lecture.

India needs a metamorphosis, not incremental progress. Its about rapid transformation, not gradual evolution. 
http://nm-4.com/yzav
